name: @alexcatdad/calico-cli
description: Command-line tool for @alexcatdad/calico. Convert data between JSON, CSV, YAML, and Markdown formats from the terminal.
author: @alexcatdad

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir dist --format esm --target node && bunx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist --skipLibCheck
